channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How the DOJ’s assault charges against protesters are crumbling inside courtrooms
item.description: The Justice Department has embarked on a monthslong effort to prosecute people accused of assaulting federal officers during protests of President Donald Trump’s immigration policies.

item.title: Bit by bit, small US groups chip away at historic levels of social isolation
Pulitzer Prize-winning correspondent Peter Arnett, who reported on Vietnam and Gulf wars, has died
